# The `MCAsmParserExtension` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Generic interface for extending the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcasmparser">MCAsmParser</a>, which is implemented by target and object file assembly parser implementations. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::MCAsmParserExtension</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Generic interface for extending the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcasmparser">MCAsmParser</a>, which is implemented by target and object file assembly parser implementations.

Definition at line 24 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/include/llvm/mc/mcparser/mcasmparserextension-h">MCAsmParserExtension.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### Initialize() {#a77a335167c72ea8bc771501825f81696}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void MCAsmParserExtension::Initialize (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcasmparser">MCAsmParser</a> &amp; Parser)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Initialize the extension for parsing using the given <code>Parser</code>.

The extension should use the AsmParser interfaces to register its parsing routines.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/include/llvm/mc/mcparser/mcasmparserextension-h/#l00049">49</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/include/llvm/mc/mcparser/mcasmparserextension-h">MCAsmParserExtension.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/lib/mc/mcparser/mcasmparserextension-cpp/#l00021">21</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/lib/mc/mcparser/mcasmparserextension-cpp">MCAsmParserExtension.cpp</a>.
